pkgmetadata.longdescription: Quaternions Splines // Provides routines to create some quaternions splines: Barry-Goldman algorithm, De Casteljau algorithm, and Kochanek-Bartels algorithm. The implementations are based on the Python library 'splines'. Quaternions splines allow to construct spherical curves. References: Barry and Goldman doi:10.1145/54852.378511, Kochanek and Bartels doi:10.1145/800031.808575.
